/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding life to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the panoramic view.
